tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Visitors (
  visitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  interests VARCHAR(255)
);
CREATE TABLE visitor_information (visitor_id INT, visitor_name VARCHAR(255), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), email VARCHAR(255), phone_number VARCHAR(15), location_id INT);

CREATE TABLE visitor_preferences (visitor_id INT, preferred_activities VARCHAR(255), fitness_level VARCHAR(20), dietary_restrictions VARCHAR(255), allergies VARCHAR(255), lodging_preferences VARCHAR(255), guide_requested BOOLEAN);

CREATE TABLE Visitors (
  visitor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE Visits (
  visit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_id INT REFERENCES Visitors(visitor_id),
  visit_date DATE,
  duration_hours INT,
  total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  feedback TEXT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
  visitor_id INT REFERENCES Visitors(visitor_id),
  nature_lover BOOLEAN,
  adventure_seeker BOOLEAN,
  budget_preference VARCHAR(20),
  additional_activities JSON
);

CREATE TABLE VisitorInformation (
    visitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(20),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE VisitorPreferences (
    visitor_id INT,
    preference_id INT,
    preference_name VARCHAR(100),
    preference_value VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (visitor_id, preference_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (visitor_id) REFERENCES VisitorInformation(visitor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EcotourismExperiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerSatisfaction (
    satisfaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visitor_id INT,
    experience_id INT,
    satisfaction_rating INT,
    feedback TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (visitor_id) REFERENCES VisitorInformation(visitor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES EcotourismExperiences(experience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Visitors (
	visitor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	visitor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	visitor_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
	visitor_age INT,
	visitor_country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Activities (
	activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	activity_description TEXT,
	activity_location VARCHAR(50),
	activity_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE Bookings (
	booking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	visitor_id INT REFERENCES Visitors(visitor_id),
	activity_id INT REFERENCES Activities(activity_id),
	booking_date DATE,
	booking_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
	feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	visitor_id INT REFERENCES Visitors(visitor_id),
	activity_id INT REFERENCES Activities(activity_id),
	rating INT CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5),
	comments TEXT
);
